description: Provides financial assistance to rural families for constructing pucca houses with basic amenities.
benefit: Financial assistance up to 1.2 Lakh in plains and 1.3 Lakh in hilly areas.

description: Income support for landholding farmer families across the country.
benefit: Annual income support of 6000 rupees in three equal installments.

description: World's largest health insurance scheme providing coverage for secondary and tertiary care.
benefit: Health cover of 5 Lakh rupees per family per year.

description: Maternity benefit program for pregnant and lactating mothers.
benefit: Cash incentive of 5000 rupees in three installments.

description: A small deposit scheme for the girl child as part of 'Beti Bachao Beti Padhao'.
benefit: High-interest savings account with tax benefits for girl's education/marriage.

description: Tertiary care health scheme for BPL and lower middle-class families in Gujarat.
benefit: Cashless medical treatment up to 5 Lakh per family.

description: Pension scheme for unorganized workers to ensure old age protection.
benefit: Assured monthly pension of 3000 rupees after the age of 60.

description: Pension scheme focused on the unorganized sector workers.
benefit: Monthly pension ranging from 1000 to 5000 rupees based on contribution.

description: Provides loans to micro and small enterprises.
benefit: Collateral-free loans up to 10 Lakh rupees for business.

description: Financial assistance to SC students for pursuing post-matriculation studies.
benefit: Tuition fee waiver and monthly maintenance allowance.

description: Promoting education for girl children in Gujarat.
benefit: Financial aid for school admission and stationary.

description: Special micro-credit facility for street vendors.
benefit: Working capital loan up to 10000 rupees with interest subsidy.

description: Promoting self-employment and organization of rural poor.
benefit: Support for SHGs and revolving fund for livelihood activities.

description: Scholarship for higher education to bright students in Gujarat.
benefit: Scholarship for tuition fees and hostel grants.

description: Facilitating bank loans to SC/ST and Women entrepreneurs.
benefit: Bank loans between 10 Lakh and 1 Crore for greenfield projects.

description: Old age pension for senior citizens below the poverty line.
benefit: Monthly pension of 200 to 500 rupees.

description: Credit-linked subsidy program for setting up micro-enterprises.
benefit: Subsidy of 15-35% on project cost up to 50 Lakh.

description: Financial assistance for girl child birth and education in Gujarat.
benefit: Lump sum amount at stages of education and 1 Lakh at age 18.

scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
description: Life insurance cover for death due to any reason.
benefit: Life cover of 2 Lakh rupees at a low premium.

description: Providing financial assistance to NGOs working for disabled persons.
benefit: Access to special schools and vocational training centers.

description: Provides tools and equipment to low-income artisans and laborers in Gujarat.
benefit: Free toolkit for 28 different small-scale trades.

description: Accident insurance scheme offering coverage for death or disability.
benefit: Accidental death and full disability cover of 2 Lakh.

description: Support for children who lost parents during the COVID-19 pandemic.
benefit: 10 Lakh corpus at age 18 and monthly stipend for education.

description: Financial aid for destitute persons, disabled, and women in Maharashtra.
benefit: Monthly pension of 1000 rupees.

description: Providing nutritious breakfast to primary school students in Tamil Nadu.
benefit: Free cooked breakfast on all school working days.

description: Conditional cash transfer to prevent child marriage in West Bengal.
benefit: Annual scholarship of 1000 and one-time grant of 25000.

description: Investment support for farmers in Telangana.
benefit: 5000 rupees per acre per season for seeds and fertilizers.

description: Providing solar pumps to farmers at subsidized rates.
benefit: 60% subsidy on solar water pump systems.

description: Short term credit for farmers to meet their cultivation needs.
benefit: Easy credit for farm equipment and seeds at low interest.

description: Crop insurance against natural calamities and pests.
benefit: Financial support for crop loss and stable income for farmers.

description: Portability of food security benefits across the country.
benefit: Access to subsidized food grains from any Fair Price Shop.

description: Awareness and welfare services for girls in India.
benefit: Ensuring survival and protection of the girl child.

description: Opportunities for students to learn about government digitalization.
benefit: Stipend of 10000 per month and exposure to MeitY projects.

description: Financial bond for girl child in Rajasthan.
benefit: Savings bond of 2 Lakh upon reaching age 18.

description: Skill certification scheme to enable youth to take up industry-relevant training.
benefit: Free skill training and placement assistance.

description: National database for unorganized workers for social security benefits.
benefit: Accidental insurance cover and direct benefit transfers.

description: Providing laptops to meritorious students in Uttar Pradesh.
benefit: Free laptop for higher education students.

description: Promoting apprenticeship training in industries.
benefit: 25% of prescribed stipend up to 1500 per month per apprentice.

description: Livelihood generation for tribals by harnessing forest produce.
benefit: Setting up tribal community owned Van Dhan Vikas Kendras.

description: Financial assistance to startups for proof of concept and trial.
benefit: Grants up to 20 Lakh for validation and 50 Lakh for commercialization.

description: Subsidies for construction of household toilets.
benefit: Incentive of 12000 rupees for building a toilet.

description: LPG connection for women from BPL families.
benefit: Free first LPG cylinder and stove with connection.

description: Scholarship for economically weaker students to prevent dropout.
benefit: Scholarship of 12000 per annum for classes IX to XII.

description: Crop insurance replacement for farmers in Gujarat.
benefit: Compensation for crop loss due to drought or excess rain.

description: Social security for widows in Gujarat.
benefit: Monthly financial assistance for widow survival.

description: Support for traditional artisans and craftspeople.
benefit: Credit support, toolkit incentive, and skill upgradation.

description: Pension for persons with severe or multiple disabilities.
benefit: Monthly pension of 300 to 500 rupees.

description: Financial inclusion program for universal banking access.
benefit: Zero balance account with overdraft facility and insurance.

description: Guarantees 100 days of wage employment in a financial year.
benefit: Guaranteed manual work and wages within 15 days.

description: Fellowship for OBC students pursuing M.Phil. and Ph.D.
